question: Who has been appointed the new chairman of Airport Authority of India?
explanation: Arvind Singh took over as Chairman of Airports Authority of India on 6<sup>th</sup> November, 2019. He is an IAS officer of 1988 batch. His post fell vacant after his predecessor, Guruprasad Mohapatra, was promoted as Secretary, Government of India. Prior to this appointment, Arvind Singh was Additional Chief Secretary (Energy) in Government of Maharashtra.
